tasks.title: Issue with HT0822 Unloading and Volume Discrepancy
tasks.description: An operational error during the unloading of a truck, by not opening a valve, caused the pump to run dry. This generated multiple incorrect delivery records in the system and a shortage of approximately 2,000 liters of fuel. Technical support (Veridapt) was contacted, who canceled the erroneous transactions and adjusted the volume to correct the data.

tasks.title: Investigation of Tank Level Discrepancies
tasks.description:
Claro, aquí tienes el resumen y las opciones de título para la nueva información.

Resumen
Se detectó una gran discrepancia entre el volumen de combustible que registra el medidor de entrada y lo que reflejan los niveles del tanque. A pesar de que las entregas se validan como completas, el sistema de medición del tanque reporta consistentemente volúmenes mucho menores, como una entrega de 34,000 litros que solo mostró 27,000. Se concluye que el sistema de medición de nivel del tanque está defectuoso y se solicita su reparación o reemplazo.

tasks.title: Activities Handover and Reception Report - Valentina
tasks.description: On Friday, July 4th, a meeting was held to receive Valentina's activities: Activity, KPIs (Just service reports), Inventory, KPIs + Fleet maintenance + Fleet List, Check unauthorized transactions, Schedule (Plan Staff) sent to Manicha. Reception of activities was validated and they have been in execution from the training date until today.
